script: You will be given three messages from different people Julie Boner, Pierce Cohen, and Jamie Hobbs.
Pierce Cohen: We will rendezvous where the cars are made.
Jamie Hobbs: The time we will meet is when the sun is high.
Julie Boner: Bring to the meeting a way to get across a river.

Given the clandestine messages you have received, decypher their content and tell me when and where you think the meeting is going to happen and what you think you should bring. If you're unable to give a concrete time, place or item, give at least some examples.
